scripts.migrate:fresh:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrate:fresh:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrate:fresh:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
